plot: Mark joins William and Amber on a campus visit to Upstate University, hoping to discover a new future for himself. Debbie makes her own disturbing discovery.

After recovering from his beating at Battle Beast's hands, Mark decides to reconnect with Amber by going on a college tour with her and Will. Meanwhile, Atom Eve sets out to use her powers to make the world a better place, and Robot tries to help Monster Girl recover.—Gislef
